text: Jim Courier was the defending champion, but lost in the semifinals to Michael Chang. Chang defeated Alberto Mancini 7–5, 7–5 in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 5==== ====Section 6==== ====Section 7==== ====Section 8==== ==References== ;General * ;Specific Category:1992 ATP Tour Men's Singles Category:1992 in American sports
